<noinclude>
== BreadcrumbList ==
Adds schema.org BreadcrumbList JSON-LD structured data for navigation.

'''Usage:''' <code><nowiki>{{BreadcrumbList|parent=Parent Page|parent_label=Parent}}</nowiki></code>

'''Parameters:'''
* '''parent''' — Wiki page name of the parent section
* '''parent_label''' — Display label for the parent breadcrumb
</noinclude><includeonly>{{#tag:script|
<nowiki>{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "BreadcrumbList",
  "itemListElement": [
    {
      "@type": "ListItem",
      "position": 1,
      "name": "Home",
      "item": "https://wiki.dreamfactory.com/Main_Page"
    },</nowiki>{{#if:{{{parent|}}}|<nowiki>
    {
      "@type": "ListItem",
      "position": 2,
      "name": "</nowiki>{{{parent_label|{{{parent}}}}}}<nowiki>",
      "item": "https://wiki.dreamfactory.com/</nowiki>{{urlencode:{{{parent}}}|}}<nowiki>"
    },
    {
      "@type": "ListItem",
      "position": 3,
      "name": "</nowiki>{{PAGENAME}}<nowiki>",
      "item": "https://wiki.dreamfactory.com/</nowiki>{{FULLPAGENAMEE}}<nowiki>"
    }</nowiki>|<nowiki>
    {
      "@type": "ListItem",
      "position": 2,
      "name": "</nowiki>{{PAGENAME}}<nowiki>",
      "item": "https://wiki.dreamfactory.com/</nowiki>{{FULLPAGENAMEE}}<nowiki>"
    }</nowiki>}}<nowiki>
  ]
}</nowiki>|type=application/ld+json}}</includeonly>
